content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a great place to live. Let's discuss the price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm interested in the apartment, but I'm a student, so I'm looking for a fair price. How much are you offering for the one-bedroom apartment?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: As a landlord, I'm always looking to get the best deal for my property. I would like to rent out my apartment for a price that reflects its quality and location. How much would you be willing to pay for such a prime location in the city center?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you want the best for your property, and I'm willing to pay a fair price for the location and quality of the apartment. Could you please tell me your initial offer?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: As a landlord, I always aim to get the best deal for my property. I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the value of this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the heart of the city center, close to all amenities. How much are you willing to pay to secure such a prime location?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm a student, so I'm looking for a price that's both fair and affordable. Could you please give me your best offer for the apartment?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: As a landlord, I'm looking to rent out my property to a tenant who values its prime location and high-quality construction. How much are you willing to pay to live in this desirable area, close to all the important facilities you need?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm willing to pay a fair price for the location and quality of the apartment. Could you please provide me with a price that reflects the value of the property?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: As a landlord, I'm offering a fantastic opportunity to live in a brand-new, unfurnished apartment in the heart of the city. The location is unbeatable, with easy access to public transportation, supermarkets, and other essential amenities. How much are you prepared to invest in living in such a prime location?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm prepared to invest in a fair price that reflects the quality of the apartment and its location. Could you please tell me your price?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: As a landlord, I'm looking to find a tenant who appreciates the value of this modern, one-bedroom apartment in the city center. How much are you willing to pay to live in an area that offers the best of urban living?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
